name: git-commit-helper
title: Git Commit Helper
description: Generate concise git commit messages from staged diffs. Use when the user asks for a commit message or wants help summarizing staged changes.
triggers: Write a commit message for my staged changes
Summarize my staged diff into a commit message
anti_triggers: Rewrite git history and force push
acceptance_tests: If no staged changes, instruct user to stage files.
If staged diff is large, suggest splitting into multiple commits.
